    Bounds
    Each cell has 4 bounds, each bound can be a door, a wall or nothing, that means that the two cells are in the same room.
    Bounds.Direction
    Direction enum.
    Bounds.Type
    Type of the bound.
    CardNotFoundException  
    Cell
    Cell class, each cell is the atom of the board, some cells are spawnpoint, the others are just normal cells which have an ammo card on it, more cells compose a room and more rooms compose the game board.
    Cell.Color
    Color enum.
    Cell.Creator
    The class that allow to create a game cell
